extendedInfo.description: Weâre excited to introduce Weight GURUS, a fun way to track your weight.Weâre working hard to make the Weight GURUS app great, so weâll be introducing new features, bug fixes and performance enhancements regularly.Please help us by reporting problems to bugs@weightgurus.com. Thank you!--Become a Weight GURU with the help of our free app. Track Weight, Body Fat & Muscle Mass over time. Setup your free account to store your data, and easily sync across all devices. âBeautifully graph your Weight, Body Fat & Muscle Mass over time âView your historical entries in a list view âWorks with or without a network connection âAutomatically keep a backup of your data in the cloud free âYour GURUS account syncs across all devices when logging inWe need your help to make this app great!  Please give us your feedback by emailing us at info@weightgurus.com

reviews.title: Missing features
reviews.comment: This app doesnt save bone mass or water percentage that my scale reads out. It also needs to tell me what normal numbers are so I dont need to google a chart every time.
reviews.author: Dana Francey

reviews.title: The camera bug is fixed
reviews.comment: I had a problem with the camera but the developers quickly fixed it!
reviews.author: Jos\303\251 Luis Dupinet

reviews.title: Having some issues but it is ok overall
reviews.comment: My home screen isn\'t tracking my weight. I see the graph, but it is not listing all of my check-ins below the graph. Untried to uninstall it and install it again..but I am having the same issue. Does anyone know how to fix this issue?
reviews.author: Meghan Brown

reviews.title: Best scale for weight loss
reviews.comment: The new update is great.  I just held my phone over the barcode, it buzzed, and my numbers were in!  I already love the scale.  It\'s so motivating to see the chart.  Good job, guys.
reviews.author: Teresa Holladay

reviews.title: Unbelievably better after recent update
reviews.comment: Amazing improvement with last update.  It use to take me 2-4 times for me to scan the barcode.  Now only 1 time. Also an undocumented feature is that you can go back and forth between the bar-code and the numbers by simply continuing to press the SCAN button with your toe or finger.  This scale rocks!  I thought it was a good deal without the ability to save the weight numbers in your phone.  Now it works great as advertised.  I purchased the scale around Jan 15 and I couldn\'t be happier with its value having used it over 5 months.  Best scale ever. (Motorola Droid razr maxx)
reviews.author: Don Verlench

reviews.title: Extremely lacking
reviews.comment: Bought the scale It measures 5 metrics but app only uses 3, leavin out water mass & bone mass. Feel like I was scammed on purchase. been tracking weight & tape measures 4 years on paper, went to enter in app for the charts & its not a function.  no way 2 export to csv either, share to Fb Twitter email, etc. I created a user id but the website has nowhere 2 log into so not sure if data is backed up. I think time of day is important to track, app only saves day. What if I weigh in more than once or around wor
reviews.author: Chris Haber

reviews.title: Highly improved!
reviews.comment: MUCH faster after last update! Used to take an eternity to load, but now it loads fast, and camera recognition is improved.
reviews.author: Nick Somers

reviews.title: Filled with bugs. Camera doesnt work
reviews.comment: In galaxy nexus with jelly bean this app is useless. Camera synchronization does not work.. It just stays there saying \"getting ready to synch\"but image never appears. Also I can\'t change it to kilograms..it kept going back to pounds so now the app says I weight 90 pounds. Finally.. Why if the scale measures water % not get it in the app? At least an option to do it manually!
reviews.author: Luis Fer Funes

reviews.title: Needs more features
reviews.comment: This app doesn\'t save bone mass or body water.  Its also missing any guides or indication of high or low results. This app doesn\'t know my age/height to provide additional info.
reviews.author: Kristi McCutcheon

reviews.title: Missing BMI, BONE MASS and Water
reviews.comment: One reason I bought this scale it was compatible with Smart phone and now to my disappointment I discover it doesn\'t show BMI, Bone Mass and Water. its showing only Weight and Muscle
reviews.author: Dani Djogani

reviews.title: Not impressed
reviews.comment: Bought the scale because of the app. Can\'t even register. Errors out every time I try.
reviews.author: LaDeama Mace

reviews.title: Good
reviews.comment: Works as advertised
reviews.author: jeremy wesley

reviews.title: Good but you need a decent camera on your device
reviews.comment: Also, the app isn\'t keeping my weight units preference, so I have to change it to kilograms like five times to enter my weight.
reviews.author: Mikey Mileos

reviews.title: Awesome app and scale
reviews.comment: I follow the weight watchers diet and I love that it syncs with my phone and I have all that data on my cell.  I have a Samsung galaxy 2 with Android 4.0.4.  No problems at all with either Tue scale or sync.
reviews.author: Marifer Vergara

reviews.title: Works great
reviews.comment: It honestly works fine for me..sometimes there\'s a glare on my scale that messes with the picture sync feature but if that happens i just enter it in manually. I\'ve been tracking twice a week since the end of February btw
reviews.author: Joaquin Garcia

reviews.title: Samsung Galaxy S3 4.2.1
reviews.comment: The idea is good but when it comes down to the whole app, it sucks. I can\'t get my camera to even open and the manual data entry is BAD. Use a touchpad not a scrolling wheel... It takes too long to use and when you enter your data using the silly wheel, the scale shuts off. Please fix your app and many people will appreciate!
reviews.author: Vaughn W

reviews.title: No longer works on my Samsung Note 2
reviews.comment: Working fine for 10 days and now no longer launches. It is a dead application! Only crashes my phone when I try to launch.
reviews.author: Terri Darvish

reviews.title: Bad image processing
reviews.comment: It takes entirely too long to take a picture good enough for the app to decode the scale\'s data, if you have the patience. The scale is glossy, making it prone to glare, and the image processing must be poorly implemented. I had to re-weigh repeatedly because I couldn\'t get a picture to sync and the sync pattern times out. It is faster to note the data on a pad of paper and enter it manually into a spreadsheet, which defies the premise of convenient data gathering.
reviews.author: Jason Graham

reviews.title: Worked fine... twice
reviews.comment: Great concept, poor implementation. It worked fine the first two times I synced.  Now, the program crashes when trying to take a picture.  Manual entry via \"wheel\" is ridiculous. If a new update doesn\'t fix this soon, I\'ll take the scale back and save $20 on a new one, then create my own quick office spreadsheet and chart the numbers myself.
reviews.author: Chris Hughson

reviews.title: The Bare Minimum
reviews.comment: This app is as basic as it gets, but you\'re pretty much getting what you pay for. The scale is pretty good, I\'ve never had much trouble with the camera, and it\'s been helpful to see how much I lose on a weekly, monthly, and overall basis.   The issue I\'m having right now (in fairness, for the first time in two months) is that it needs to connect to a server, which makes no sense to me because there\'s really nothing in this app that should require a connection. Using airplane mode allows me to get around this, but still.
reviews.author: George Green
